author: Fiona Denton
description:
I love A.G. Slatter’s writing. She is one of those authors who, for me, could rewrite a phone book, and I’d probably eagerly jump in and expect to enjoy it. However, Slatter’s latest offering is the horror novella The Cold House. I love Slatter, but I am a wimp at horror. I’m good with gothic […]

The post REVIEW: The Cold House by A.G. Slatter appeared first on Grimdark Magazine.
title: REVIEW: The Cold House by A.G. Slatter
